summary: An email from an FBI Special Agent in the New York VCAC/Human Trafficking unit transmitting a summary report of Jeffrey Epstein's travel from January 1, 2015, to April 21, 2019. The document indicates ongoing FBI monitoring of Epstein's movements during this period.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The document is a summary of his travel movements from 2015 to 2019, compiled by the FBI.

events.title: Epstein Travel Monitoring Period
events.description: The FBI compiled a summary of Jeffrey Epstein's travel during this 4+ year period.

keyFacts: The FBI's New York Violent Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking unit was actively monitoring Jeffrey Epstein's travel from at least 2015 to 2019.
A detailed travel summary covering over four years of Epstein's movements was compiled by the FBI as of April 2019.
The document shows ongoing federal investigation into Epstein's activities related to human trafficking concerns.
